import React, { useState } from 'react' import AddShoppingCartIcon from '@mui/icons-material/AddShoppingCart'; import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorder'; import BalanceIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Balance'; import './Product.css' import useFetch from '../hooks/useFetch'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const Product = () => { const id=useParams().id; const[sletectedImg,setSelectedImg]=useState(0); const {data,laoding,error}=useFetch(`/products/${id}?populate=*`) const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1); const images=['http://localhost:1337'+data?.attributes.img.data.attributes.url,'http://localhost:1337'+data?.attributes.img2.data.attributes.url] console.log(data) return (
setSelectedImg(0)} id='nimg'/> setSelectedImg(1)} id='nimg'/>

) } export default Product
